column4: Hello! Is anyone here what can help me with a ubuntu partition making/doing and how to get the web with ndiswrapper or whatever its called?

I tried the live cd, but i couldent seem to get ndiswrapper to..do anything
was the wifi card enabled with iwconfig?
can we PM ? This channel is crowded :x
